entity.name: item
entity.deltaQuery: select id from item where last_modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'

entity.name: feature
entity.query: select DESCRIPTION from FEATURE where ITEM_ID='${item.ID}'
entity.deltaQuery: select ITEM_ID from FEATURE where last_modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
entity.parentDeltaQuery: select ID from item where ID=${feature.ITEM_ID}

entity.name: item_category
entity.query: select CATEGORY_ID from item_category where ITEM_ID='${item.ID}'
entity.deltaQuery: select ITEM_ID, CATEGORY_ID from item_category where last_modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
entity.parentDeltaQuery: select ID from item where ID=${item_category.ITEM_ID}

entity.name: category
entity.query: select DESCRIPTION from category where ID = '${item_category.CATEGORY_ID}'
entity.deltaQuery: select ID from category where last_modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
entity.parentDeltaQuery: select ITEM_ID, CATEGORY_ID from item_category where CATEGORY_ID=${category.ID}
